import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Nav from '../../components/browse/Nav'; import SearchResult from '../../components/search/SearchResult'; import './Search.css'; const Search = () => { const [query, setQuery] = useState({ keywords:'' }); const [searchInput, setSearchInput] = useState(''); const handleSearch = () => { setQuery({keywords:searchInput}); } const resetSearch = () => { setQuery(''); setSearchInput(''); } return (
setSearchInput(e.target.value)} value={searchInput} />
); }; export default Search;
